articles.title: Friendly gathering held
Film show held on National Day of Spain
articles.content:
Film show held on National Day of Spain 
    Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- A film show was held at the Chollima House of Culture yesterday on the occasion of the National Day of Spain.    It was sponsored by the DPRK-Spain Friendship Association.
 Present there were Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is also chairman of the association, and members of the association and working people in the city.    
 After a speech was made, the participants saw a Spanish documentary film.

articles.title: Appeal by secretariat of CILRECO
Foreign diplomats visit various places
articles.content:
Foreign diplomats visit various places 
    Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Diplomatic envoys and staff members of foreign embassies here visited the national fine art exhibition yesterday on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 56th anniversary of the WPK.
 They saw art works including those depicting the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung and the greatness of Kim Jong Il.   
 That day they also visited the educational and scientific exhibition, a laboratory of automatic control engineering, a scientific and technological information library and other places of Kim Chaek University of Technology.
